column1: Local Foods////I'm vegetarian so I've never gotten their Crunchy Chicken Sandwich
column2: but as you can suspect from the rest of the Yelp reviews - this sandwich is probably their most fantastic. I'm not a fan of their Falafel sandwich
column3: because mine was a little too salty
column4: but the Egg Salad is perfect and so much more flavorful than any Egg Salad sandwich I've ever had (they're usually pretty bland...). They use real crab in their Crab sandwich
column5: which is also a plus. The decor is incredibly refreshing
column6: and it's an amazing atmosphere to have a great meal with friends.
